## WeakValueMap class

Map to weakly held values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class WeakValueMap<K, V extends object> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [\[Symbol.iterator\]()](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap._symbol.iterator_.md) |  | Get iterator over the map entries. |
|  [clear()](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.clear.md) |  | Remove all entries from the map. |
|  [delete(key)](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.delete.md) |  | Delete a key from the map. |
|  [entries()](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.entries.md) |  | Get iterator over the map entries. |
|  [forEach(callback, thisArg)](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.foreach.md) |  | Call a function for each entry of the map. |
|  [get(key)](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.get.md) |  | Gets value associated with a key in the map. If the key does not exist, or the weak reference to the value has expired, this return <code>undefined</code>. |
|  [has(key)](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.has.md) |  | Check if the map contains a key. |
|  [keys()](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.keys.md) |  | Get iterator over the map keys. |
|  [set(key, value)](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.set.md) |  | Set entry in the map. |
|  [values()](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.values.md) |  | Get iterator over the map values. |
